{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|filesystem}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
enum class directory_options {
    none = /* unspecified */,
    follow_directory_symlink = /* unspecified */,
    skip_permission_denied = /* unspecified */
};
}}
{{dcl end}}

This type represents available options that control the behavior of the {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/directory_iterator}} and {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/recursive_directory_iterator}}.

{{satisfies bitmask|directory_options}}

===Member constants===
{|class="wikitable"
|-
! Member constant
! Meaning
|-
|{{tt|none}}
|(Default) Skip directory symlinks, permission denied is error.
|-
|{{tt|follow_directory_symlink}}
|Follow rather than skip directory symlinks.
|-
|{{tt|skip_permission_denied}}
|Skip directories that would otherwise result in permission denied errors.
|}
